  • Method Details

    • getNextPlay

      public java.lang.String getNextPlay​(int nHands, PlayerHand p_hand, Hand d_hand, int bet)
      Calculates the next play according to the basic Strategy tables.

      The Basic Strategy tables are divided into 3 situations:

      - the opening hand is a pair;

      - there are no Aces or all the aces in the hand value 1: hard hand

      - there is at least one Ace in the hand that values 11: soft hand

      For every of these cases, there's a method called by the getNextPlay method, that gets the advisable play.

      Specified by:
      getNextPlay in class PlayerStrategy
      Parameters:
      p_hand - Represents the player's hand.
      d_hand - Represents the dealer's hand.
      bet - Represents the bet going in the game.
      nHands - Number of hands that the player has already.

    • hard

      public java.lang.String hard​(int p_hand_value, Card d_card, int bet)
      Calculates the action when the hand is hard
      Parameters:
      p_hand_value - Total value assigned to the player's hand.
      d_card - Represents a dealer's card.
      bet - Represents the bet.
      Returns:
      best course of action according the Basic Strategy

    • soft

      public java.lang.String soft​(int p_hand_value, int d_card_value, int bet)
